name: Parallelia (Demo)
description:
Parallelia is a first person puzzle game with non-euclidean geometry which tries to offer a less ordinary experience. It's not a long exploration with a twisted history made in a minimalist style. Pay attention to details and try to find the right path.

It's the prototype of a game I'm currently working on . It is an attempt to combine some interesting mechanics in relation to simple deisgn  (largely because I'm not good at game design but also I really prefer the minimalist style). 

Some opinions would be really interesting for me. Definitely this version of game  it will not be the complete idea that I will want to convey in the final build.

If you liked the game you can add it on STEAM WISHLIST, ty.
